qolmat.imputations.rpca.rpca.RPCA

class qolmat.imputations.rpca.rpca.RPCA(n_rows: Optional[int] = None, maxIter: Optional[int] = 10000, tol: Optional[float] = 1e-06, verbose: bool = False)[source]

This class is the root class of the RPCA methods.

Parameters
n_rows: Optional

Number of columns in case reshaping of the 1D signal.

maxIter: int, default = 1e4

maximum number of iterations taken for the solvers to converge

tol: float, default = 1e-6

tolerance for stopping criteria

verbose: bool, default = False

Methods

fit_transform(signal[, return_basis])

Fit to data, then transform it.

get_params()

Get parameters for this estimator.

set_params(**kargs)

Set the parameters of this estimator.
